attributes.action: Stop the use of "no reply accepted" emails
attributes.additional_details:
Emails from a company or corporation using a "no reply accepted" email system should be designated as professional spam and declared illegal.
If email is good enough for their message transmissions, it is good enough for an individual's reply.
Most companies from Banks downwards currently do thier utmost to avoid receiving enmail replies to their unsolicited messages, and we need to re-establish a Right of Reply via the media chosen by the originator.
